mapper.select: SELECT (EXISTS (SELECT * FROM friend, friend_group WHERE friend_group.id = friend.friend_group_id and friend_group.owner_id = #{user1} and friend.friend_user_id = #{user2}) ) AS is_friend
mapper.update: UPDATE friend SET friend_group_id = (SELECT id FROM friend_group WHERE owner_id = #{userId} AND name = #{friendGroupName}) WHERE friend_group_id IN (SELECT id FROM friend_group WHERE owner_id = #{userId}) AND friend_user_id = #{friendUserId};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM friend WHERE friend_group_id IN (SELECT id FROM friend_group WHERE owner_id = #{userId}) AND friend_user_id = #{friendUserId};
